title: fanoutqa: What is the estimated population in 2023 of the 5 current most populous cities in the world? (8cc68563679b85fa)

<fragment>

In many countries, metropolitan areas are established either with an official organisation or only for statistical purposes. In the United States, metropolitan statistical area (MSA) is defined by the U.S. Office of Management and Budget (OMB).[9] In the Philippines, metropolitan areas have an official agency, such as Metropolitan Manila Development Authority (MMDA), which manages Manila metropolitan area.[10] Similar agencies exist in Indonesia, such as Jabodetabekjur Development Cooperation Agency for Jakarta metropolitan area.[11]



## List[edit]


There are 81 cities in the world with a population exceeding 5 million people, according to 2018 estimates by the United Nations. The U.N. figures include a mixture of city proper, metropolitan area, and urban area.[12]

chat_history.name: search

chat_history.content:
Based on the most recent data available from the search results, here are the estimated populations of the 5 most populous cities in the world in 2023 (using urban area/metropolitan area figures as they better represent the actual population of these megacities):

1. Tokyo, Japan: ~39.1 million
2. Jakarta, Indonesia: ~34.5 million
3. Delhi, India: ~32.2 million
4. Seoul, South Korea: ~26 million
5. Shanghai, China: ~24.8 million

It's important to note that these figures are estimates and can vary depending on how city boundaries are defined (city proper, urban area, or metropolitan area) and the source of the data. Also, some of these numbers might have changed slightly since the most recent official counts, but these represent the most reliable recent estimates available.

The ranking of these cities can also fluctuate as they are all growing at different rates, and different sources might rank them slightly differently depending on how they define and measure urban populations. Additionally, some of these cities continue to grow rapidly, particularly in developing nations, which means these numbers are constantly changing.

functions.name: search
functions.desc: Search Wikipedia for an article with the given title, and get its content. If no such article is found, return similar article names.
